ResumeParserData.Experience: Sales Manager  Microsoft, London, UK  August 2015 - Present  At Microsoft, I lead a high-performing sales team to achieve and exceed sales targets. My role involves developing and implementing strategic sales plans, managing key client relationships, and identifying new business opportunities. I work closely with marketing and product teams to align sales strategies with business objectives. My efforts have resulted in significant revenue growth and increased market share. Additionally, I mentor and coach team members, fostering a collaborative and results-driven environment.  Sales Executive  IBM, London, UK  June 2011 - July 2015  During my tenure at IBM, I was responsible for managing a portfolio of high-value clients and achieving sales targets. My role involved identifying client needs, presenting tailored solutions, and negotiating contracts. I collaborated with internal teams to ensure the successful delivery of products and services. My proactive approach and strong relationship-building skills contributed to a 20% increase in client retention and overall sales growth.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Experienced Sales Manager with over 9 years in the sales industry, specializing in B2B sales, client relationship management, and team leadership. Proven track record in achieving sales targets, driving business growth, and developing strategic sales initiatives.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Anthony has an experience in the domain of 'Management of Companies and Enterprises', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Marketing and Sales Managers. The candidate has been working as a Sales Manager at Microsoft for the last 9.0 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Anthony holds a Mid Management Level position, as Sales Manager at Microsoft. from 01/08/2015 to 15/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 9.0 years in this company.

Anthony holds a Low Management Level position, as Sales Executive at IBM. from 01/06/2011 to 31/07/2015. The candidate has a total experience of 4.2 years in this company.

Professional Summary
